===Overview===
The '''Los Angeles Dodgers''' are an [[American]] professional baseball team based in [[Los Angeles]], [[California (State)|California]]. The Dodgers compete in Major League Baseball. Established in 1883 as the Brooklyn Dodgers in [[Brooklyn]], [[New York]]. They played from [[Ebbets Field]]. The team moved to Los Angeles before the 1958 season now playing from [[Dodger Stadium]].

===Events===
====Brooklyn Dodgers====
[[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Steve Rogers]] was born and raised in Brooklyn and was a huge Dodgers fan. He would visit Ebbets Field when ever he could afford too.{{r|Captain America: Man Out of Time Vol 1 2}}

In 1945, Cap traveled back in time from the future to the end of [[World War II]]. His first stop was to Ebbets Field to see is beloved Dodgers.{{r|Captain America: Man Out of Time Vol 1 2}}

====Modern Era====
When Captain America was unfrozen he was shocked and saddened to learn his beloved Dodgers had moved to Los Angles.{{r|Captain America: Man Out of Time Vol 1 2}}
